Back to Claude Debussy

Claude Debussy

À la fontaine (Robert Schumann)

1903 · Lesure2003 appendix 3 · Lesure1977 appendix 3

[IMSLP]

This is an arrangement of Robert Schumann’s Am Springbrunnen from Zwölf Klavierstücke für kleine und große Kinder (op. 85 no. 9), originally written for piano duet.

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5
